hotels.title: Balearic Islands Opulence: Menorca Beachfront Hideaway with Daily EUR50 Credit & Nightly Cocktails
hotels.description: Escape to the island of Menorca in the sparkling Mediterranean Sea, where a luxuriously whitewashed, light-flooded and seafront haven awaits. Let relaxation take the lead, whether you're unwinding in your private retreat, lounging on a poolside cabana on the rooftop or swimming in the crystal-clear waters below. Dining here is a gastronomic journey - indulge in Menorcan cuisine and fresh seafood at S'Amarador, sample wine and cheese at Saó and start your day with breakfast and ocean views at the laid-back Nivi. Menorca’s first carbon-neutral luxury hotel, this exclusive retreat offers facilities steeped in thoughtful luxury - from direct beach access to the Thai Room Spa & Wellness, where massages and treatments overlook the Mediterranean.
